<div class="well">

#### FAQ

**What method is used to estimate genetic correlation?**

We use [LD score regression to estimate genetic correlation](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4495769/). The LDSC code is available at the [ldsc GitHub repository](https://github.com/bulik/ldsc).
